data.title: Assistant City Managers
data.meta_description: An assistant city manager focuses primarily on organizational issues so that the city manager can focus more on external issues. In small cities, the assistant city manager is the second-highest-ranking employee in the organization. Select Assistant City Managers to navigate to contact information.
data.text:
An assistant city manager focuses primarily on organizational issues so that the city manager can focus more on external issues.

Accommodations are available for residents who have accessibility requirements. To learn more about accessibility accommodations available from the City of Fort Worth, visit the Accessibility page. Request Accommodations (English) / Solicitud de Acomodaci√≥n (Spanish) due to disability.
